name: CampTO Plus at Spadina Museum
description: Kids can enjoy arts and crafts like paper making, clay modeling and baking, inspired by the historic Spadina house and gardens. Explore a 100-year-old home, uncovering hidden secrets and learning about life in the 1920s. With outdoor games, garden visits and creative projects, this camp offers a fun, unique experience like no other

name: Internal Voice Art Exhibition

address.streetAddress: 399 The West Mall - Etobicoke Civic Centre

description:
Collective919 explores how identity is shaped by cultural exchange. From traditional Korean paper paintings to mixed media, each artistic expression provides a glimpse into the universal human experience of self-reflection. To learn more, visit https://collective919info.wixsite.com/collective919

Join the Artists on Saturday August 23, 2 to 4 p.m. for the opening reception. Light refreshments provided.
